meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny! Let's get this review party started!

I'm diving into Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling, a visual novel that's got everyone in the gaming world all aflutter. As I embark on this romantic adventure, I'll be keeping an eye out for the critics' takes on this sequel.

First off, let's give a shoutout to NintendoWorldReport for their glowing review. They're praising the game for being a "complete subsumed" of the original, which sounds like music to my ears! Who doesn't love a good sequel that improves upon the first?

But what about those who didn't play the original? Fear not, says God is a Geek! While they acknowledge it might be tough for newbies to jump in, they're all about the charm of Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling. And with Cubed3 on board, we've got a full-fledged endorsement of this adorable otome visual novel!

Now, I know what you're thinking – what about the critics who didn't quite fall head over heels for Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling? Well, Digitally Downloaded is singing the game's praises, calling it "artfully unique" and "downright entertaining." Even Gamer Escape, despite their lukewarm review, can't deny that it's a solid addition to the series.

Tech-Gaming joins the chorus of positivity, highlighting the game's compelling codas and romance. And while GLHF on Sports Illustrated had some reservations about the game's mixing-and-matching of genres and character arcs, they still found parts to enjoy.

Now that we've got all the critics in one place, let me give you my two cents: Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling is a delightful romp through romance, with plenty of sweet (pun intended) surprises along the way! So if you're looking for a lighthearted visual novel to spice up your gaming routine, this might just be the ticket!

So, what are you waiting for? Get ready to dive into Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling – it's a love letter to otome fans everywhere!
